ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Class InvertibleAffineTransformation3

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.AffineTransformation3
      • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.InvertibleAffineTransformation3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AffineTransformable3, AxisStretchable3, LinearTransformable3, RigidBodyTransformable3, Rotatable3, Scalable, ShapePreservingTransformable3, Stretchable3, Translatable3, Serializable

    public class InvertibleAffineTransformation3
extends AffineTransformation3
implements Serializable
    A class for classes implementing AffineTransformable3 that require the inverse of the transformation matrix.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
